Package org.trimou.engine.segment

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ContainerSegment
    Segment which contains other segments.
    Segment
    Compiled template segment.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommentSegment
    Comment segment.
    ExtendSectionSegment
    Either defines a section to be extended/overrided, or an extending/defining section.
    ExtendSegment
    This segment extends some template and overrides its extending sections.
    ImmutableIterationMeta
    An immutable iteration metadata.
    InvertedSectionSegment
    Inverted section segment.
    LineSeparatorSegment
    Segment representing a line separator.
    Origin
    A segment origin.
    PartialSegment
    Partial segment.
    RootSegment
    The root segment of a template.
    SectionSegment
    Section segment.
    SetDelimitersSegment
    Set the new tag delimiters.
    TextSegment
    Text segment.
    ValueSegment
    Value segment (aka variable tag).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SegmentType
    Type of segment.
